de: Forschung zu Infrastrukturen der Daseinsvorsorge, wie Stromnetze, Gasnetze, Kommunikationsnetze, Anlagen, Strukturen, Systeme
en: Research on infrastructures of public services, such as power grids, gas networks, communication networks, facilities, structures, systems

example.en: Mobile communication networks, gas networks, intelligent energy network, network infrastructure, supply network
